title: We Are As Gods
brief_description:
We Are As Gods is a series of short intercut performances that are fictional webcam streaming
videos akin to a ‘Let’s Play’ or ‘Twitch’ stream. Using the tools and infrastructure of
streaming (overlays, templates, framing) the work features local actors who talk to themes of connection, multiplicity, division, unity.
